titleStmt.title: Jesus Nazarenus, Rex Judaeorum. Or, a tract concerning the inscription fastned by Pilates command
titleStmt.author: Bourchier, John, Sir, d. 1660.

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint from STC (2nd ed.).
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1475-1640 reel 2003 misbound and has title page torn.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church, Oxford.
